gengine.gameobject

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • gengine.gameobject.GameObject
        • gengine.gameobject.MovableObject
          • gengine.gameobject.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends MovableObject
    This is the base class for moving enemy object which is constantly on the move. When colliding with other non-player related objects it randomly heads to other direction.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Lauri Pirttimaki

      Default constructor.

      Default constructor.

      Method randomizes a free direction for enemy object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy()
        Default constructor. Sets objectType to ENEMY and randomizes the initial direction.

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int x,
             int y,
             int w,
             int h)
        Default constructor. Sets objectType to ENEMY and randomizes the initial direction. Takes the coordinates and dimensions as parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - - x coordinate
        y - - y coordinate
        w - - width of the enemy object
        h - - height of the enemy object

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.List<GameObject> objects,
                   long delta)
        Method handles logic. When hit with a non-player related object it turns to a random other direction and proceeds its movement.
        Overrides:
        update in class MovableObject
        Parameters:
        objects - - all related objects
        delta - - time between frames

      • randomizeDirection

        public void randomizeDirection()
        Method randomizes a free direction for enemy object. It also sets isMoving to true in case it already wasn't it.
